title: Loop header to move robot to gray square

content.description: The following grid contains a robot represented as a triangle, which is initially facing right.
content.question: The following code segment is intended to move the robot to the gray square. <MISSING STATEMENT> { REPEAT 4 TIMES { MOVE_FORWARD() ROTATE_RIGHT() } ROTATE_LEFT() MOVE_FORWARD() ROTATE_RIGHT() } Which of the following can be used as a replacement for <MISSING STATEMENT> so that the code segment works as intended?

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Implement and apply an algorithm.
